txt_en: I want us to be together, for as long as we've got.
txt_cn: 余生的每一天，我都想和你在一起。

txt_en: Anything is possible.
Death is just a part of life. Something we're all destined to do.
txt_cn: 死亡是人生必经的部分，我们终将勇敢面对它。

txt_en: Don't obsess over the weight of life's problems.
txt_cn: 别被生活中的困难打倒。

txt_en: You deserve to be happy.
You make your own destiny.
Autumn is coming.
I'm happy no matter what we do. As long as it's together.
txt_cn: 只要与你在一起，无论做什么都很开心。

txt_en: We are all born with a unique gift.
txt_cn: 每个人都拥有独特的天赋。

txt_en: Someday you'll meet someone special.
txt_cn: 总有一天你会遇到特别的人。

txt_en: Life is something to be experienced.
I will spend my life showing you how much I love you.
txt_cn: 我将用一生向你证明我有多爱你。

txt_en: Some things are worth fighting for.
txt_cn: 有些东西值得为之一搏。

txt_en: Self-reliance is the key to a good life.
txt_cn: 自力更生是幸福的关键。

txt_en: All we can do is try and move forward.
Things are going to get much better.
You never get any glory without a little pain.
txt_cn: 不经历风雨，怎能见彩虹。

txt_en: Success is earned.
Everyone needs a friend.
You can't live your life according to maybes.
txt_cn: 生活不单单依靠未知的可能。

txt_en: I'm capable of greatness.
Freedom comes from self-reliance.
Pressure's an important part of success.
